mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, HASH FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY HASH ASC) as rnum, SEQ, HASH FROM INSTA_HASH WHERE HASH LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) A WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT SEQ, ID, PWD, EMAIL, NAME, REGI_DATE, OPEN, PROFILE_IMAGE, HOMEPAGE FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SEQ ASC) as rnum, SEQ, ID, PWD, EMAIL, NAME, REGI_DATE, OPEN, PROFILE_IMAGE, HOMEPAGE FROM INSTA_MEMBER WHERE ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) A WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 10
